content.en: Signal DOA estimation: Researchers are exploring the use of artificial neural networks (ANNs) and deep learning algorithms to improve the estimation of the direction of arrival (DOA) of signals in various environments. These algorithms, such as convolutional neural networks and LSTM neural networks, are being tested for their ability to accurately estimate the DOA of multiple sources, even in challenging conditions with array imperfections and low signal-to-noise ratios. The goal is to develop more efficient and robust methods for DOA estimation, which could have applications in fields like marine acoustics and soundfield analysis.
content.da: Signal DOA-estimering: Forskere undersøger brugen af kunstige neurale netværk (ANN'er) og dyb læringsalgoritmer for at forbedre estimeringen af signalers ankomstretning (DOA) i forskellige miljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom konvolutionelle neurale netværk og LSTM-neurale netværk, bliver testet for deres evne til præcist at estimere DOA af flere kilder, selv under udfordrende forhold med array-imperfektioner og lav signal-støjforhold. Målet er at udvikle mere effektive og robuste metoder til DOA-estimering, som kunne have anvendelser inden for områder som maritim akustik og lydbaneanalyse.
